## Bio

Mary de Boer, MSc., is a global public health professional with more than 13 years
experience working with local and international non-governmental organizations and
bilateral donors.  Her work has taken her to Latin America, Sub-Saharan Africa, 
Central Asia, and South Asia.  Mary's current focus is on implementation science, 
examining the lessons learned from an ongoing randomized controlled trial of a 
maternal nutrition intervention -- Balanced Energy Protein (BEP) supplementation --
in rural northwestern Bangladesh.  Mary has experience in both qualitative and 
quantitative research methods, economic analysis, program design, training 
development and delivery, and leadership and management.
